attributes.action: Propose CITES resolutions enhancing rhinoceros, lion and elephant protection.
attributes.additional_details:
White rhino, Ceratotherium simum: Near Vulnerable. Remove South African & Swaziland population exemptions from CITES App.l.

Black rhino, Diceros bicornis: Critically Endangered. No hunting trophy quotas from 2016 onwards.

African lion, Panthera leo: Vulnerable/Endangered. Add the African lion to CITES App.l. 

African elephant, Loxodonta Africana: Vulnerable/Endangered. Remove population exemptions of Botswana, Namibia, South Africa and Zimbabwe from CITES App.I. 

CITES.org; iucnredlist.org
attributes.background:
White & Black rhino, African lion and elephant populations are increasingly targets of illegal poaching demands. Act now to protect these dwindling populations from 'commercial' trophy killings.

Ref: https://iwbond.org/2015/09/02/the-economics-of-poaching-trophy-and-canned-hunting
